Package etu2011.framework.utils.helpers

Class DateHelpers

java.lang.Object
etu2011.framework.utils.helpers.DateHelpers
public class DateHelpers extends Object
The DateHelpers class is used to provide helper methods for time, date and datetime operations.

  • Method Details

    • getSupportedPatterns

      public static String[] getSupportedPatterns(AnnotatedElement dateField) throws NoSuchMethodException, IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException
      Returns the supported time|date|datetime patterns for a given date field.
      Parameters:
      dateField - The date field to get the supported date patterns from.
      Returns:
      The supported date patterns for the given date field or the default date format if the element is not annotated with @DatePattern.
      Throws:
      NoSuchMethodException
      IllegalAccessException
      InvocationTargetException

    • format

      public static Date format(Class<?> type, String date, String pattern) throws ParseException, InvocationTargetException
      Converts a given date to a Date | Time | Timestamp object.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the date to be converted.
      date - the date to be converted.
      pattern - the date pattern of the given date.
      Returns:
      a java.sql.Date object.
      Throws:
      ParseException - if the given date is not compatible with the given date pattern.
      InvocationTargetException - if the valueOf method throws an exception

    • getValidSqlDateFormat

      public static String getValidSqlDateFormat(Class<?> type)
      Returns the valid pattern according to the provided type
      Parameters:
      type - The date type
      Returns:
      The pattern for the specified date type
